title: Batman - Ashes To Ashes
description:
Ashes to Ashes is an unofficial short film shot in 13 days and postproduced in France between 2006 and 2008. This fan film is based on the Batman character created by Bob Kane and on the graphical universe of Franck MillerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Sin City.  Original screenplay by Samuel Bodin and directed by Julien Mokrani & Samuel Bodin.

The script was almost composed of a 100 pages but Julien only wanted 20 pages. Cutting the script was heartbreak to me. But I did it.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â« Our Batman is not human Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â», Julien explained, Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â« heÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s a shadow, he wants revenge. His figure is very sharp, vampire-like and rough. The only thing you will recognize from NolanÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Batman is his deep and rough voice. MillerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s work (Dark Knight, Sin City) and Dave McKeanÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Batman : Arkham Asilum were inspiring to us. We also used the retro style of the Tim SaleÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢Joker. Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â»

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â« HeÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s kinda like an enormous Nosferatu whom you just canÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t define the contours Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â», Samuel added, Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â« a furious divinity if we could say so. And for this we used fishing thread and fabrics! LetÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s say we are proud of the result. This happened thanks to the extraordinary work the postproduction team done. Postproduction was a huge part of the project since the major part of this short-film was shot with a green screen. On a visual point of view, we used R.RodriguezÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s work as a background but finally we would use as little 3D as possible and work with 2D solids to be as close as possible of comics universe.  300ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s skies, MignolaÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Gotham by Gashlight and hundreds of photos of New-York under the 20ies and 40ies helped us create our Gotham : a city not yet out of the economic crisis in 1939.Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â»

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Another awesome independent movie. Very well done and quite fun..

Hope you enjoy this movie, and support the creators...

The movie itself is in .flv format. Why? Because I couldn't be bothered to convert it...

Also check out their website: http://www.ashestoashes-themovie.com/
